args.natural_language_statement: Let n be a finite type with decidable equality, and R a commutative ring. For a permutation σ : Equiv.Perm n define the permutation matrix P by P_{i j} = 1 if j = σ i and 0 otherwise. Prove that det P ∈ {-1, 1}, i.e. det P = 1 or det P = -1. Translate this statement to Lean4 (import Mathlib at top) and end the theorem with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem det_permutation_matrix_eq_one_or_neg_one {n : Type} [DecidableEq n] [Fintype n] {R : Type} [CommRing R]
  (σ : Equiv.Perm n) :
  Matrix.det (fun i j => if j = σ i then (1 : R) else 0) = 1 ∨ Matrix.det (fun i j => if j = σ i then (1 : R) else 0) = -1 := by sorry
